table.name: Countries
table.select: SELECT Code AS CountryCode, en.Label AS English, fr.Label AS French, nl.Label AS Dutch FROM Country FULL JOIN CountryTranslate AS en ON en.CountryCode = Country.Code AND en.LanguageCode = 'en' AND en.DeletedDate IS NULL FULL JOIN CountryTranslate AS fr ON fr.CountryCode = Country.Code AND fr.LanguageCode = 'fr' AND fr.DeletedDate IS NULL FULL JOIN CountryTranslate AS nl ON nl.CountryCode = Country.Code AND nl.LanguageCode = 'nl' AND nl.DeletedDate IS NULL WHERE Country.DeletedDate IS NULL AND Code IS NOT NULL
table.update: UPDATE CountryTranslate SET Label = @English WHERE CountryCode = @CountryCode AND LanguageCode = 'EN' AND DeletedDate IS NULL UPDATE CountryTranslate SET Label = @French WHERE CountryCode = @CountryCode AND LanguageCode = 'FR' AND DeletedDate IS NULL UPDATE CountryTranslate SET Label = @Dutch WHERE CountryCode = @CountryCode AND LanguageCode = 'NL' AND DeletedDate IS NULL
table.delete: UPDATE Country SET DeletedDate = GETDATE() WHERE Code = @CountryCode UPDATE CountryTranslate SET DeletedDate = GETDATE() WHERE CountryCode = @CountryCode
table.insert:
-- https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/miah/2008/02/17/sql-if-exists-update-else-insert/ UPDATE Country SET DeletedDate = NULL WHERE Code = @CountryCode IF @@ROWCOUNT=0 INSERT INTO Country (Code, CreatedBy) VALUES(@CountryCode, 'Admin')
-- Insert or update the english label UPDATE CountryTranslate SET Label = @English, DeletedDate = NULL WHERE CountryCode = @CountryCode AND LanguageCode = 'EN' IF @@ROWCOUNT=0 INSERT INTO CountryTranslate (CountryCode, Label, LanguageCode, CreatedBy) VALUES(@CountryCode, @English, 'EN', 'Admin')
-- Insert or update the french label UPDATE CountryTranslate SET Label = @French, DeletedDate = NULL WHERE CountryCode = @CountryCode AND LanguageCode = 'FR' IF @@ROWCOUNT=0 INSERT INTO CountryTranslate (CountryCode, Label, LanguageCode, CreatedBy) VALUES(@CountryCode, @French, 'FR', 'Admin')
-- Insert or update the dutch label UPDATE CountryTranslate SET Label = @Dutch, DeletedDate = NULL WHERE CountryCode = @CountryCode AND LanguageCode = 'NL' IF @@ROWCOUNT=0 INSERT INTO CountryTranslate (CountryCode, Label, LanguageCode, CreatedBy) VALUES(@CountryCode, @Dutch, 'NL', 'Admin')
